headline.main: British Convoy Is Safe in Russia; Battled Nazi Planes for Five Days; BIG BRITISH CONVOY IS SAFE IN RUSSIA

lead_paragraph: LONDON, June 2 -- After successfully fighting off persistent attacks by a swarm of more than 100 German dive-bombers and torpedo aircraft for five days and facing a constant threat from U-boats in ice-strewn Arctic waters, a large convoy carrying supplies to Russia has reached its destination, the Admiralty announced today.
abstract: London repts Brit convoy safe in USSR; 7 or 8 ships lost; 3 German planes downed, 4 damaged; Commodore N Gale, Flying Officer A Hay, officers and crews praised
